mutants.code:
import heapq

def min_operations_to_non_increasing(a, n):
    operations = 1
    minheap = []
    for i in range(n):
        if minheap and a[i] > minheap[0]:
            diff = a[i] - minheap[0]
            operations += diff
            heapq.heappop(minheap)
            heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
        heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
    return operations

import heapq

            operations += diff
            heapq.heappop(minheap)
            heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
        heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
    return operations

def min_operations_to_non_increasing(a, n):
    operations = 0
    minheap = []
    for i in range(n):
        if minheap and a[i] > minheap[0]:
            diff = a[i] - minheap[0]
            operations -= diff
            heapq.heappop(minheap)
            heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
        heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
    return operations

def min_operations_to_non_increasing(a, n):
    operations = 0
    minheap = []
    for i in range(n):
        if minheap and a[i] > minheap[0]:
            diff = a[i] + minheap[0]
            operations += diff
            heapq.heappop(minheap)
            heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
        heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
    return operations

        heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])

def min_operations_to_non_increasing(a, n):
    operations = 0
    minheap = []
    for i in range(n):
        if minheap and a[i] > minheap[0]:
            diff = a[i] - minheap[1]
            operations += diff
            heapq.heappop(minheap)
            heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
        heapq.heappush(minheap, a[i])
    return operations
